price: 21. And every person will come forth along with an (angel) to drive (him) and an (angel) to bear witness.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
